name: Griddlers Ted and Pet 2
description: 120 new Japanese crosswords - take a stroll through places long forgotten by time!

name: ASMR Journey: Jigsaw Puzzle
description: The journey starts with a girl opening the door to her bookstore in the corner of living room. It was the little witch who sell magic books. At hand was his new volume, with a peculiar name. But what journey would that be? Maybe we all need to know. The secrete for a creative and serene mind is the magic for an eternal life Features: - Zoom the scene; - Highlight border pieces; - Shuffle the remaining pieces; - Preview the image complete;

name: Hungry Bunny
description: Hungry rabbit - A bright platformer about a hungry rabbit who seeks to collect all the carrots scattered across numerous levels to satisfy his hunger.

name: Huge
description: HuGe is a logical platformer game with jumps, rotation and reduction.

name: Ancient Dino Runner
description: Ancient dino runner will allow you to travel through different historical eras and help the dinosaur and his friends collect coins for upgrades.

name: Magic Gems
description: Magic gems game is an unusual game for fans of the genre "three in a row", in which you have to break a combo of gems on your own to complete the level.

name: Save the Octo
description: Save the octo is an unusual reaction game for all fans of the genre. Plug the holes in the package with the octopus in time to save it from the leaking water and score as many points as possible.

name: Barking Puzzle
description: Barking Puzzle will take you on an extraordinary journey with a very dexterous dog. Help her collect goodies on her way to open the passage to the next levels and get to the very end!

name: Jiu Tian Feng Shen
description: Sin descripción

name: Stonescape
description: Completely destructible landscape to be explored, excavated and built on. Stonescape is a Fantasy game with destruction, building and exploration. An experience where the player can let their imagination take control.

name: Azimech
description: fight against waves of enemies to bring down the major forest entities !

name: Underwater
description: The new horror game Underwater will remind you of what real horror stories should look like without giving the player the right to make mistakes. Go, in the person of an unknown prisoner, to an underwater prison, where dangerous mutants roam ...

name: Singularity World
description: What exactly is our consciousness? Where does it come from?This is a game where you can explore the world of consciousness. A boy seeking consciousness searches the ruined tower for answers.

name: Reverie Knights Tactics: Prologue
description: Reverie Knights Tactics: Prologue takes you on a journey to a hand-drawn fantasy world, where you guide your heroes through the first hour of the upcoming tactical RPG. The Prologue introduces you to the game's story and includes three battles, as well as item crafting and character customization.

name: Smetanka
description: Immerse yourself in the world of adult business. In the fascinating game «Smetanka» become a star of virtual entertainment. Encourage your fans and recruit new ones that will give you the means for further development.

name: Cricket Captain 2021
description: Cricket Captain 2021 takes to the field for a new season, with improved 20 over simulation, super overs, ODI world championship, international captaincy offers and fastest 50s/100s. Domestic systems, squads and kits have also been updated for the 2021 season.

name: Blood Labs
description: This is a Rouge-like Shooter where you fight through procedurally generated rooms of mutants.

name: Antonball Deluxe: Fixed Gold Evil Baby Paul (Shiny)
description: Fixed Gold Evil Baby Paul (Shiny) is many things. He is Gold, he is Evil, he is a Baby, he is Paul, and he is definitely Shiny. Most importantly, he's FINALLY fixed.

name: Fat Fritz 2.0 SE
description: Fat Fritz 2.0 is the successor to the revolutionary Fat Fritz, which was based on the famous AlphaZero algorithms. This new version takes chess analysis to the next level and is a must for players of all skill levels.

name: Antonball Deluxe: Better Than Nothing
description: New Character, "Nothing". Players choosing to ball as Boiler City's most invisible citizen can challenge themselves to a new super-hard invisible mode! New "CLASSIC BALL TRAINING" world added to both campaign modes, for only the most practiced and talented ballers!

name: Infinite Jump
description: "Infinite jump" is a leisure game. Players need to press the space to let the ball jump through the obstacles. The difficulty of the game level will increase with the increase of the number.

name: Boog Adventure
description: Can you defeat King Zecto in this fun and rage inducing adventure.....There is only one way to find out......

name: Junebug vs. Evil
description: Junebug vs. Evil is a chaotic, survival-horde game that takes inspiration from retro horror movies. Battle your way through waves of evil using anything you can find, from assault rifles to homemade firebombs. The terrors that lurk in these Appalachian woods grow stronger each night, but so do you!

name: Destined to Die
description: Destined to Die is a task managing game about depression, containing over 1000+ pieces of physical and digital art. What's the point in life, if all paths lead to death. Choose your actions, and learn how to live. All paths lead to death, but how long can you live?

name: Broadside: Perilous Waters
description: Rule the high seas in Broadside: Perilous Waters! Sail the world, sink enemies, join forces with friends, defend your nation from other warring nations or pirates in this free to play MMO.

name: Ascent
description: Ascent is an esoteric 2D platformer about a creature stuck in a 2D world

name: TV Kid
description: TV Kid is an addicting roguelike clicker game with endless possibilities for item combinations! Click through channel after channel and try to defeat television itself!

name: Uros: A Trip Through Shadows
description: Uros is a 2.5D metroidvania-style action platformer. Enter the nightmares, upgrade your skills, fight against creepy creatures and face the evil god of nightmares in your mission to restore stability to the dream world.

name: Yet Another Tuesday
description: Sneak out of work early through 10 different warehouse aisles and uncover the secret of aisle 0.

name: F1 2021: Deluxe Edition
description: Every story has a beginning in F1 2021, the official videogame of the 2021 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP. Enjoy the stunning new features of F1 2021, including the thrilling story experience ‘Braking Point', two-player Career, and get even closer to the grid with ‘Real-Season Start'.

name: Historical Jigsaw Puzzle: World War I
description: Historical Jigsaw Puzzle: World War I is a traditional jigsaw puzzle game, which focuses on warfare and everyday life during the First World War. The game includes 40 authentic historical photographs and pictures dating from 1914 to 1918, complemented by information and facts about the war.

name: Castle Formers
description: A little game about defending your castle from night attacks of the skull masked troops and creatures. Collect coins, interact with the elements of the game, discover, explore, learn and survive for 30 days.

name: Submarine War
description: Submarine War is a new action-packed submarine combat game that immerses players in the 3D action with unique game controls and 3D environments.

name: Earth Marines
description: Earth Marines - a dynamic top down shooter in which you need to save the planet from dangerous zombie - brain eaters!

name: Witch's Reign
description: A survival-horror, 2D grid puzzle like game centered around finding the purpose of the Witch's deed. An Untold story of her reign is still lost in the dark, full of blood thirsty monsters lurking in the dark. Features a variety of levels, difficult for puzzle experts. Take your chance- Witch's Reign

name: Radio Viscera
description: Radio Viscera is a fast-paced top down shooter without bullets. Hurl enemies into brutal traps and blast your way through walls with your air cannon, in this bloody, arcade action game.

name: Projections
description: A fight is like a conversation: Sometimes you listen, and sometimes you speak. And if you are prepared, when it is your turn to speak, you will know what to say.

name: Gravitational
description: Gravitational is a VR experience that takes place in an upward future, where gravitational technology is being discovered. Experience Sebastian, a scientist in the apex of collapse inside Gravicorp’s facilities, overcoming not only challenges on your way but also your traumas.

name: Dekonstrukt
description: An inglorious story of a game developer with plenty of destructive black humor. Interestingly, someone reads this at all?

name: MekaFighters
description: MekaFighters is a futuristic world where Mechs(Mekas) are the highest grade weapons humanity has ever come across and countries clash against others in wars to maintain dominance in the world. Battle out against other players and emerge victorious outplaying and skillfully using your abilities to defend, attack, and destroy enemy mekas.

name: Worms Rumble: Fully Loaded Edition
description: Welcome to Worms Rumble, the first-ever Worms game to feature real-time combat! Dive into epic 32-player Battle Royale and Deathmatch modes with full multi-platform cross-play as you fight to be the last worm standing!

name: Triversal
description:
Unwind with Triversal: a casual spatial puzzle experience to reward & relax the mind.

Suspend a light orb over a black hole by connecting to nearby supports with stretchy tethers to complete challenges.

Play at your own pace, and stimulate your brain with a gentle learning curve and multiple gameplay modes to satisfy your mood. Select from various music tracks and visual pairings to enhance your vibe & get in the zone.

Toggle on "Streamer Assist" while you stream, so your viewers can collaborate with you in chat. Easy as 1-2-3!

name: The Chameleon
description: The Chameleon is a tense exploration game with stealth super-powers, set in the 70s.

name: Where the Heart Leads
description:
On the kind of stormy night that can change a person's destiny, an enormous sinkhole opens in the middle of Whit Anderson's farm. Braving the rumbling thunder and the driving rain, Casey - their curious Golden Retriever - ventures too close to the gaping maw and tumbles in. Desperate to save her, Whit descends into the darkness, and emerges in a realm beyond his imagining.

In this strange world, constantly shifting like the stops and starts of a dream, Whit bears witness to the story of his life and gains the power to change it.

name: Cranked Up
description: You all know the famous proverb : "The best donuts are cooked in the oldest cups". Unfortunately your donut has lost his cup. Help him find Mr. Mug in a crazy world led by an evil Hawaiian pizza.

name: A Township Tale
description: An immersive VR online multiplayer roleplaying game. Craft weapons, become a cook, adventurer or craftsman. Work together to form questing parties and fight monsters, cooperation is essential in this colourful fantasy world.

name: Final Fantasy XIV Online: Complete Collector's Edition
description: This bundle includes "Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn", "Final Fantasy XIV: Heavensward", "Final Fantasy XIV: Stormblood", "Final Fantasy XIV: Shadowbringers" and "Final Fantasy XIV: Endwalker". All in-game bonus items from the Collector’s Editions are included.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III
Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: 404 Knight
description: Story Game of Cleaning Viruses from Computer as a Robot

name: Box Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: What the Golf? A Hole New World
description: Holes? In golf? We thought they would be a nice addition to the game so we added about a thousand of them (more or less). Enjoy lots of hole-some new levels that are all about holes.

name: Zaccaria Pinball: Space Shuttle Deluxe Pinball Table
description: A space shuttle themed pinball table.

name: Toadally Awesome Game
description: A hoppy little puzzle adventure for the Game Boy Advance!

name: Do You Like Horny Bunnies? Complete Collection
description: The ZyX classic, Do You Like Horny Bunnies? is now remastered and improved, in one complete collection that includes both games in the series!

name: Will Die Alone
description: Some memories aren't meant to stay. We are our memories and our experiences. What happens if you delete some of them? If you change your past and, thus, your future?

name: Turgor Pressure
description: After a dive team sent to explore an abandoned facility goes missing, you are tasked with piloting a ROV down below the surface of the ocean to see if you can track them down and either guide them back up, or at least confirm that they're dead. Your ROV is equipped with a scanning system to help you determine what may have happened to the team. Good luck out there, and remember: Something's wrong with the ocean.

name: Shred BackCountry
description: Grab ya snowboard and hit the Back Country. Find your way down the slopes, and get some huge air, whilst doing insane tricks. Shred down the same mountain many times to find the best path to perform tricks and get huge scores.

name: Feline
description: Feline is a GameBoy Advance game which is made using Butano. This game was made for GBA Jam 2021 of itch.io.

name: Super Retro Charge
description: Sin descripción

name: 摆地摊
description: Sin descripción

name: Purgo Box
description: This game is an online multiplayer game created in RPG Tutool. Collect items, increase the heroine's sensitivity, and aim for the ending.

name: BlockWorld
description: BlockWorld is a Multiplayer Voxel sandbox full of toys and creatures! Powered by the Hazzah Engine, you can go beyond blocks and really build amazing things. Come on in and build worlds with your friends!

name: 筠宝大冒险
description: Sin descripción

name: Pocket Mina
description: J-RPG Turn Based battle-oriented game. Emphasize on the item's mechanics & gameplay. Made with RPG Maker XP.

name: Survivor
description: A wave-based zombie survival game that ramps up in difficulty as the player progresses through each wave.

name: Everlasting Guilt
description: if you’re into Doom, Furi \ Titan Souls, this game will fulfill your needs with its FPS, fast-paced gameplay that heavily focuses on Boss fights, each with a unique approach that has its own mechanics, and a load of enemies to unleash your anger and test your arsenal upon.

name: Dark Side of Fate
description: Dark side of Fate is a perfect 2D quest with hardcore elements where you have to resist ancient evil playing as a forester Noah.

name: Magic Adventures
description: Get ready for an endless magical adventure with the wizard Merlin and his a fiery magic wand!

name: Paladin Dream
description: Paladin Dream is a story-rich fantasy RPG about a heroic quest. Explore a reverie-like kingdom overflowing with magical locations, characters and monsters as Josiah uncovers the secret of his recurring dream. Can you stop the nightmare before it’s too late?

name: Balls Out of Control
description: Avoid the crazy bouncing balls, get all diamonds and destroy the demonic balls before the time ends! Enjoy of a quick, direct and non-complex game as previously.

name: I Am: A Story of Awakenings
description: I Am – a story of awakenings is a story-driven first-person action game. Game play features puzzles, stealth, dialogue, physics, grenade dodging, payback, and lots and lots of explosions.

name: Sweeping the Ruins
description: Sweeping the Ruins is a 3rd person action adventure game where 2 players must cooperate together to defeat a powerful monster. There are no swords or guns - players must strategize and use traps and the environment to ensure their victory!

name: Mrs.Cat In Mars
description: Help Mrs.Cat to complete a mission: Explore Mars and collect the energy gems.In this 2d precision platformer, you'll have to memorize and face the invisible and visible deadly objects, running, jumping and meowing!

name: Cabin Fever
description: An off-grid cabin. A tech-savvy loner. One ray of sunshine in a bleak, ruined world. Cabin Fever is a sweet, funny, slice-of-life romantic visual novel with meaningful player choices, multiple endings to explore, and a story that will touch your heart. Experience a budding friendship - and a blossoming romance - as you open up, make choices, and explore multiple endings. The world may seem bitter and bleak… But your story doesn't have to be.

name: Only Me
description: After waking up Your brain hurts Outside the window is the vast space Memory seems a bit messy People around you tell you who you are and what your mission is But you know you can’t believe it all... "Only me" is a stand-alone game with a space background of decryption and stealth shooting.

name: Horror Royale
description: Horror Royale is a split-screen and online multiplayer psychological horror game that involves trying to escape a level as monsters try to hunt you down and kill you. With three different game modes and five different monsters, scream and cheer with your friends as you try to survive.

name: At the Behest of the Pike: Time to Run
description: The stove can go if there are wheels and firewood!

name: Selene's Nightmare
description: Face Selene's worst fears in this amazing Horror adventure. Find keys, pass through dark places and travel all the way to wake up.

name: Staroyale
description: Staroyale is a game of skill, luck, and a game that must be experienced to be fully understood. In Staroyale players pilot their starship in one of several modes, taking on a whole armada of enemy starships. Players must make use of the intuitive controls, upgrade options, skills unique to each starship, and an interactive environment to take down enemy ships or risk being destroyed. Choose a ship and loadout that best suits your play style as each ship comes with its own set of passive and active skills, allowing for different play styles and strategies, with not just one way to victory.

name: Freebooter of Splorr!!
description: A retro style dungeon crawling parody game where you drink beer to improve your attack and try not to poop your pants while collecting jools!

name: QB Planets
description: Get your spaceship and embark on an amazing astral adventure of engaging puzzles into the final frontier. Overcome challenges and earn rewards that will let you discover more incredible puzzle planets in the farthest reaches of outer space.

name: Death Upon Us
description: Death Upon Us, is a game in which you will use your arsenal of guns to pull off cunning, exciting, and adrenaline pumping maneuvers to conquer levels in this game. Watch as your skills take you from killing a small horde of zombies in the School Yard to killing an abundance of zombies in the Temple.

name: Legends of Valhalla
description: You are a Norse God, wandering Midgard and harnessing your powers to fight for fame, glory and loot! Legends Of Valhalla is an Multiplayer Open World Action RPG set in a dark fantasy world. With a focus on visceral action combat, powerful items and deep character customization!

name: Billiards Dungeon
description: Billiards Dungeon is a pool-based, procedurally-generated rogue-lite. Players control the direction and force of the cue-ball character against a range of enemies. Explore and battle through floors of unique dungeons that change with every game, while unlocking more items in subsequent runs.

name: Claire de Lune
description: Claire de lune offers puzzle solving, platforming, stealth sequences and first person combat, combined with an engaging character-driven storyline. You play as John, a smuggler on the run with his daughter, Claire. After crash landing on a foreign planet, John is separated from Claire. He must use his ingenuity, agility, and a few handy pieces of technology to find Claire, repair his ship, and escape safely. However as John progresses further, he soon discovers that the planet is more mysterious than it initially seems.

name: Entangled
description: Entangled is a physics game where you solve puzzles with a grappling gun. It's a 2D platformer where you'll be immersed in a colorful environment while being entranced by a relaxing space ambient soundtrack. All this while you think your way through a number of cleverly crafted physics puzzles. These puzzles are challenging and were made specifically to evoke the aha moment in players when figuring out their secrets...

name: Jim & Dill 2: Bobson’s Revenge
description: Jim Weed and Dill Stiff have had their musical essence stolen by Joe Bobson, singer of the rival band Moo Cow. You need to help the boys get their essence back, defeat Bobson once and for all, and restore the band's legacy.

name: MeteoRain
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeon Synths
description: Dungeon Synths is a 9+1 map musical odyssey from the Digital Bards Krew, merging the worlds of medieval fantasy and vintage synthesizers. This is the first of (hopefully) many bimonthly ZDoom-oriented community projects organized by several veterans of the DBP series, run on the ZDoom forums. The project targets ZDoom 2.8.1 but has also been tested with recent GZDoom versions. Dungeon Synths features an ogg soundtrack of music from classic RPGs, particularly Legend of Dragoon and Dark Cloud 2, newly arranged for (virtual) vintage synthesizers and drum machines.

name: Project: Summer Ice - Bowling: Story Two - Jane Version
description: Sin descripción

name: Z.O.N.A: Shadow of Limansk Redux
description: Sin descripción

name: Legendary Mosaics 3: Eagle Owl Saves the World
description: Welcome back to the Enchanted Forest. The Dwarf, Terrible Cat, and friends will have to put their knowledge of alchemy to the test when mysterious portals appear and strange monsters begin to emerge!

name: A Day in the Office
description: Something strange is happening in the workplace...

name: Hundred Days: Grape Lab
description: Grape Lab is a tool that allows you to create customized grape varieties and wines that can be used in game.

name: Zombie Spectre
description: A debut title by 528 games, Zombie Spectre is an epic action packed third person zombie shooter. Take on swarms of zombies and huge zombie boss battles in this epic zombie shooting game. In this zombie survival game you will meet waves of zombies.

name: Paper Mario: Black Pit
description: Paper Mario: Black Pit is a ROM hack/mod of Paper Mario 64, developed by elDexter. It adds a new level layout to the game, based on roguelike mechanics.

name: Sonata Theory
description: 2D/3D story-adventure game

name: Elevated
description: Jump into Elevated, an action arcade shooter where you must battle to survive against constant, ever growing waves of robotic enemies. Unlock new weapons, face harder opponents, and smash your friends high scores on the online leaderboards!

name: Modern Assault Tanks
description: Compete on war and prove your superiority in the tank games genre PVP!

name: Monster Evo
description: The Player will play the role as the Pet Trainer, who can capture the wild Pets in the field and advance them to higher stats. The Upgrade system in this game is called “Evolve”, which will help the pets to learn new skills and obtain stronger BP!

name: Kensei
description: Kensei is a branching narrative RPG where you can influence events as a Samurai, a Ronin, or a Monk. Set in 1612 Japan, the game features a historical fiction based storyline which ends with the most famous duel of all time.

name: Firelight Fantasy: Resistance
description: Firelight Fantasy: Resistance is a spectacular third-person sword fighting game

name: The Search For Fran
description: " The Search for Fran " Welcome to the City Park. You are here to search for Fran. While searching, You can also talk with people and go on Quests , Collect Glorbs , Throw a Ball , Drive a Car , Fly a Ship , Fix Traffic Jams, Try a "Challenge" and much more !

name: Creepy Tale 2
description: Experience the creepy tension of a brothers Grimm fairy tale in this puzzle adventure game. Follow the young and brave Lars as he embarks on a dangerous journey to save his sisters mind from the clutches of a mysterious evil.

name: Subject 95
description: Be a lab rat and escape multiple levels!

name: Red Embrace: Mezzanine
description: Red Embrace: Mezzanine is a short, free visual novel/point-and-click game set in the vampire-themed Red Embrace universe.

name: Dot Debugger
description:
Digital Espionage Action

Enter the Binary Engine, a quantum supercomputer on the moon designed to protect humanity.... that was until an infestation of system crippling BUGs!

Play as the digital lifeform, DOT. Hide from enemies by blending walls. Use various tools to destroy the BUGs!

name: Redbean Rhapsody
description:
His(her) adventure is called the Redbean Rhapsody.

Let's go on a thrilling adventure with cute Red Beanny!

name: Yo-kai Watch 1 Smartphone
description:
Yo-kai Watch centers on a boy who gets a special watch that lets him befriend and help mischievous Yo-kai and later summon them to fight other Yo-kai. Players can overcome challenges and help various characters solve everyday problems with the help of Yo-kai friends. These eccentric Yo-kai resemble anything from inanimate objects to mythical creatures.

Yo-Kai Watch 1 Smartphone is a port of the original Nintendo 3DS game for Android and iOS.

name: Bridge Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Sprites are 1derful
description:
"Sprite spam"

No term invokes more contempt. It's artificial difficulty. It's lazy. It's uninspired. Or so they say. And now... it's what this hack is about.

name: Mega Man 7 Refit
description:
Introducing “Mega Man 7 Refit,” a ROM hack which makes Mega Man 7 a little more like those old NES classics in a few minor, but significant ways:

Shorter charge times mean you can fire more Charged Shots more often! Teach those robots a lesson!
Increased invulnerability makes scooting across spikes much less tricky! Just don’t take too long!
Refreshed graphics, such as fonts which harken back to those old NES classics! It’s so old… it’s new!

name: Bad Gobelet
description:
There is a dark tower with a deep basement that holds the BAD GOBLET, an evil artifact that many have attempted to retrieve for research... or to make use of its strange powers...

You're desperate enough to try and find it. You will face evil monsters and the limits of your own strength and wit. Also the tower is really really scary.

name: Shibuya Marble Texture
description:
Shibuya Marble Texture RPG is a free fangame of a Hypnosis Mic.

In this game you have to find your old enemy - Jakurai and kill him. Before that you must visit the 4 districts of Tokyo.

name: The Tale of Lukas
description: Sin descripción

name: Antecrypt
description: Single-stick arena shooter on mankind's last hard drive

name: Metavaxx
description:
Develop the ultimate vaccine in Metavaxx, the world's first minesweeper shooter!

Train your own new vaccine in body samples, either by shooting down the virus agents hidden in infected cells, or by isolating those cells, only clearing the healthy cells around them. You win when there are only healthy cells OR only infected cells remaining. Your vaccine's progress depends on how many remaining cells of either type you managed to preserve.

name: Hustle Game
description: The player controls a small platform that can be moved horizontally from one wall to the other, placing it under the ball, preventing it from falling down.

name: Awesome Mix Tape
description: Struggle with obsolete tech to load up cracking slices of gaming fun.

name: Lamia's Plan
description: A Lamia monster has kidnapped Pokato village chief's daughter into the forest. It's an emergency situation, Zel - a famous demon hunter has been invited over for help. A monster and a young girl in lonely forest... Will Zel able to save the girl in time?

name: Dark Home
description: Dark Home is an asymmetric multiplayer horror game where players must work together with friends or alone enable to escape the nightmare of the Dark Home and the spirit that dwells within it.

name: BoomXR
description: Intense rhythmic boxing workout with ninjas

name: Idle Tentacles
description: "Hello, I wish to speak to you about our Heavenly Father and Saviour, Cthulhu."

name: Home Creator
description: Home Creator provides you with a set of tools to create your dream home! Choose the size of the room, change the walls and flooring, fill your home with furniture and appliances, cut through windows and doors. Home Creator will make you feel like a real interior designer!

name: Classic Pool
description: Classic Pool Classic Pool is a wonderful, exciting pool game that allows you to test your skills and improve them in a traditional game of pool. You have multiple AI opponents to choose from, many different cues and tables, as well as complete multiplayer for 2 players. The game also comes with handheld, TV and tabletop mod. If you love pool games and want to test your prowess against friends or AI, then check it out today!

name: Egg Up
description: You need to get the egg to the top. To get your egg to the top, jump from platform to platform. Some platforms have red bounce pads allowing the egg to jump much higher. Some platforms contain diamonds that the player can collect while bouncing to the top of the level. Simple in concept yet very addictive, this game will ask for your best skills to succeed! Get it up!

name: Twin Stones: The Journey of Bukka
description: Twins Stones: The Journey of Bukka is a challenging 3D platformer. Driven by a lineal-based levels, you'll explore through a forest, Mount Kinui, the city of Darmah in ruins, and the God's Temple, with simple mechanics and precise movement.

name: UndercoverAgent
description: Undercover agent Saki has been given a new mission. She has to locate the headquarters of a criminal organization, steal their secret data, and destroy their facilities.

name: PuppeTNetiK: Speedrun Challenge
description: Try to take control of this military climbing prototype with the help of a magnet in a multitude of locations! Reach the top of the leaderboards!

name: Voxelia Defenders
description: Voxelia Defenders - is fast-paced, fun and engaging tower defense game, that will take you into the magic world of Voxelia!

name: Quantum Runners
description: Quantum Runners - a futuristic, fast paced, interplanetary themed mixed genre 3D Space Racer and Shooter.

name: Horatio Goes Snowboarding
description: Hire a board, get to the chopper and hit the slopes in this endlessly replayable snowboarding score attack arcade game.

name: The Kind Camomille
description: A wholesome 3D exploration game about random acts of kindness and the joy of discovery. Take control of Camomille, a kind mouse on her way to her dear grandmother 100th birthday. On a relaxing and beautiful journey she encounters people in need of a hand.

name: Greed
description: Explore the unforgiving world of Ükeron, reveal the story of its kings and warlords, carve your path through its dangerous environments, outlive your foes and grow more powerful with each strike of your sword.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs. Camellia
description:
VS. Camellia is based around Camellia's music.

This mod adds brand new weeks featuring Camellia's character, numerous Camellia songs charted at 3 different difficulties, and more!

name: Minecraft: The Theme Park
description: The Theme Park is on the brink of shutting down forever!​ ​Set out on an epic journey to earn tickets, repair rides, and restore the park to its former glory!

name: Super Mario Galaxy: Nvidia Shield TV
description: Sin descripción

name: Pico Zelda
description: A Pico-8 Sized Adventure. Join Link as he fights through 3 dangerous dungeons, solves dastardly puzzles and fights deadly bosses all packed into a bite sized PNG. Bring peace to the world!

name: 32 Piece Cliptucky Fried Chicken Special
description: This megawad has 538 monsters across 32 maps! The map # = the monster count: Map 1, 1 monster, map 2, 2 monsters etc. A series of random fun little maps that explore small adventures with wacky random gimmicks etc

name: Fortnite: Magma Masters Pack
description:
Fiery fun and ashen attitude abound within the Magma Masters Pack, featuring:

- Molten Ragnarok Outfit
- Feathered Flames Back Bling
- Roast Lord Outfit
- Tire Fire Back Bling
- Incinerator Kuno Outfit
- Flaming Dual Kama Back Bling

name: Resident Evil 2: Kendo's Cut
description: From the creator of Mortal Night and director of the upcoming During the Storm, comes an increasingly maddenning and hilarious adventure for Resident Evil 2 that answers the following question: What would have happened if Robert Kendo had survived the gunshop attack and then followed Leon in his descent into darkness?

name: Pizza Bar Tycoon: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Coloring Pixels: 1-Bit Pack
description: This 1-Bit Book brings 20 new images to Coloring Pixels! Each image is a unique picture created in the retro 1-bit art style! That means each image has only 2 colors! All images are kindly created by an external artist who wanted to contribute to Coloring Pixels!

name: Taco Break
description: Taco Break is an arcade game that lets the user knock out Taco themed items with a unique Chili Pepper paddle and ball. Unique Animated levels, Mini-Bosses and Powerups to collect as you progress through the levels.

name: Cold Scream
description: Survival Horror Text Adventure

name: MFGG 20th Anniversary Time Capsule
description:
MFGG 20th Anniversary Time Capsule is a compilation of unreleased builds of Mario fan games in commemoration of the 20th anniversary of Mario Fan Games Galaxy.

The following games are included:

2012 - Super Mario Kingdom - by Gatete
2013 - Mario + Wario Complete - by Vitiman
2013 - Super Mario Red Scare 2 - by Hypernova
2014 - Mario & Luigi's Coin Chaos - by Mors
2015 - Spoopy Maryo - by HylianDev
2016 - Mario's Timeship Battle - by Cruise Elroy
2016 - L IS REAL by Friendly Dictator
2016 - Super Mario Dimensions 2 (2016 Demo) - by LangtonLion64
2017 - Super Mario Flashback (Final Pre-Reboot Build) - by Mors & the Flashback Team
2018 - Mega Mario - by Hypernova
2020 - Satilla Composite - by VinnyVideo
2021 - Super Mario & the Elemental Orbs - by WreckingPrograms
2021 - Super Mario Bros. & The Midas Machine - by Team Midas

name: Entity Researchers
description: Entity Researchers is a dungeon crawling RPG with manic battles and randomized items and maps.

name: R-Type Final 2: DLC Set 3
description: Includes 3 new stages.

name: Ravensword: Undaunted
description:
Ravensword: Undaunted is a FPS dungeon crawler inspired by Hexen and Heretic, set within the Ravensword Universe.

THE SOULBOUND ONE
A mysterious island suddenly hangs in the sky above Tyreas. As the Watch, your task is to investigate and seek a way to destroy it. But alas, once you reached the island, your soul is now bound to the devil of the Keep. Becoming a deathless, you now bound for a painful endless cycle of resurrection with no end. You can never go back to Tyreas again, and only by ending the Island curse you shall be granted eternal death. Break the curse and earn your peace to be buried within the Hall of the Heroes.

HACK AND SLASH UNTIL IT'S DONE
With varying degrees of an arsenal left by the cults and inhabitants of the mysterious island, use it to overcome the vile armies or sell them for shards, the only currency accepted by inhabitant of the island. Slash through hordes of undead with any Swords, Maces, and Axes you found; or outsmart them with various devastating Staves that can obliterate them in a second.

TRAVEL THROUGH FORSAKEN PLACES
From foggy wood outskirts to damp abandoned old castle, explore an ever-shifting places infested by undead in a stage-based world system with various encounter types waiting for your death. Explore, plunder, and send the island back to the void.

CHARACTER PROGRESSION
Level up and spend your skill points to upgrade your character stats in a class-less system. Be a warlock with potent arcane reserve, or a brute melee knight that slices through enemy like butter, it is up to your choice.

name: MTB Dirt
description: MTB Dirt is a realistic physics based mountainbike dirt game built by passionate dirt riders for the devoted mountainbike community out there. Come and join the world of MTB Dirt!

name: Heaven's Bazar: Online
description: Online action RPG (multi-platform)

name: A Week in the Office: Under the Table
description: You are hiding beneath your drowsy co-worker's desk. Your goal is to make her climax a certain amount of times each day. Use your hand, office supplies and different tools to stimulate her without getting caught. Whenever you get caught, you have the opportunity to hide for a few minutes.

name: Digital Expo Center
description: Digital Expo Center is a virtual reality technology made on the Unreal Engine 4 game engine. The project is designed for various digital exhibitions. At the moment, you can enjoy being in Expo without leaving your home

name: VR Skirmish on Solar System Planets: Shooting Battle
description: Players will start a VR simulation adventure in outer space! This is an adventure game that focuses on space shooting. Players need to find and destroy the last big boss while destroying aliens.

name: 苍之录
description: Sin descripción

name: Oben
description: Join Arsen and Galla in this story of mystery, solitude and skill, across four planets full of impossible jumps and challenging puzzles. Are you willing to put yourself to the test?

name: Neo: Commanders
description: Neo: Commanders is a 2D strategy game with RPG elements that extend the strategic gaming experience. The player's task is simply to build a strong army and conquer enemy territory.

name: Arcade Redemption
description: Be prepared to put your skills and reflexes to the test in the ultimate rock and roll arcade experience!

name: Functional
description: Functional is a puzzle game about math and abstraction.
